skills.name: Draw a Bead
skills.blurb: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} The {{sti|range}} of '''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} and {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} are increased by {{pp|0 to 136}} for a total of {{pp|525 to 661}} range.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: The range of Tristana's basic attacks, Tristana's Explosive Charge and Tristana's Buster Shot are increased by 0undefined − 136undefined (based on level) for a total of 525undefined − 661undefined (based on level) range.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.blurb: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' empowers her cannon, gaining {{sti|Attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
skills.notes: * ''Rapid Fire'' is a non-refreshing buff that will not update on rank-up.

skills.name: Rocket Jump
skills.speed: {{tt|1100|Can differ based on dash range/terrain interference}}
skills.blurb: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' {{tip|dash|jumps}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60%.
''Rocket Jump's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset upon scoring a {{tip|takedown|takedown}} on an enemy champion or detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} at maximum stacks on an enemy champion.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Tristana jumps to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by 60%.
Rocket Jump's cooldown is reset upon scoring a takedown on an enemy champion or detonating Tristana's Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on an enemy champion.
skills.notes:
* '''Tristana''' can still use her [[champion ability|abilities]], [[summoner spell]]s, and [[active ability items|item actives]] during ''Rocket Jump''.
* ''Rocket Jump's'' dash speed depends on the distance of the jump. Close-ranged jumps are much shorter while long-ranged jumps leave '''Tristana''' in the air significantly longer.
* If '''Tristana''' has less than 850 movement speed, a full-range ''Rocket Jump'' (including its cast time) will make her arrive quicker at its destination than walking at this speed could.
* Killing {{tip|clone|clones}} or detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} on them also resets ''Rocket Jump's'' cooldown.
** The former may be unintended.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow Duration:

skills.name: Explosive Charge
skills.cast_time: {{tt|{{as|{{fd|0.226}} (at base attack speed)|attack speed}}|Always equal to 100% of Tristana's attack windup}}
skills.blurb: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemies explode when [[kill]]ed by '''Tristana's''' basic attacks, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies near them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' places an explosive charge on the target enemy, including {{tip|turret|turrets}}. After 4 seconds, the charge detonates, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, including turrets. The explosion radius is doubled when the charge is placed on a turret.

'''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|abilities]] against the target increase ''Explosive Charge's'' damage by 30%, [[stack]]ing up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.

''Explosive Charge's'' '''total''' damage is increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 33.3 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.333%*critical strike chance, capped at 33.3% increase}}|critical chance}}.
''If {{ai|R|Tristana}} is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} or the 4 seconds expire.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Enemies explode when killed by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing magic damage to all enemies near them.
Active: Tristana places an explosive charge on the target enemy, including turrets. After 4 seconds, the charge detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, including turrets. The explosion radius is doubled when the charge is placed on a turret.
Tristana's basic attacks and champion ability against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
Explosive Charge's total damage is increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
If Tristana's R is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the knock back or the 4 seconds expire.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50 to 150}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time is always 100% of the caster's attack windup time.
** At base attack speed, '''Tristana's''' attack windup is {{fd|0.225625}} seconds.
** An easy formula to calculate the cast time is [ {{fd|0.14801}} seconds divided by {{as|'''total''' attack speed|attack speed}} ].
** Reducing '''Tristana's''' attack speed via {{tip|cripple|attack speed reductions}} also increases ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time by the same fraction.
** It is calculated from '''Tristana's''' total attack speed after cap (2.5) and floor (0.2), making the maximum possible cast time {{rutngt|0.74005}}.
* '''Tristana''' will be automatically ordered to basic attack the target.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' initial application deals 0 {{as|physical|physical damage}} {{tt|damage|sourcetype pending for test, but probably proc}}, triggering {{tip|turret}} aggro.
** It also triggers a [[stack]] of effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* All explosions by ''Explosive Charge's'' passive count as the same cast instance. Every cast of the active is a separate cast instance:
** Hitting a champion with the passive by killing a nearby unit, casting the active on them (see note above) and landing a basic attack against them triggers {{ri|Electrocute}}.
** Hitting a champion with the passive by killing a nearby unit, casting the active on them and hitting them again with the Passive by killing another nearby unit does '''not''' trigger {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* {{tip|Dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}} all prevent ''Explosive Charge's'' stack application via basic attacks.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' detonation will deal damage to the primary target even if they have become {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' stacks from basic attacks are '''not''' applied as an [[on-hit]] effect and will therefore not interact with {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} Phantom Hit or {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts.

effects.str: • Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

skills.name: Buster Shot
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|200|Around target once the missile hits}}
skills.speed: {{tt|2000|Missile speed}} / {{tt|1500|Knockback speed, can differ slightly based on circumstance}}
skills.blurb: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that upon arrival deals {{as|magic damage}} to them and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} all enemies around them, including the target, {{tt|for up-to {{fd|0.75}} seconds.|See notes}}
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that upon arrival deals magic damage to them and knocks back and stuns all enemies around them, including the target, for up-to 0.75 seconds.
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and deals 0 {{tip|default damage}} to secondary targets.
** The 0 damage to secondary targets triggers {{tip|turret}} aggro, but does not stack {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}}.
* '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Buster Shot''.
* ''Buster Shot's'' {{tip|airborne|displacement}} direction is based on '''Tristana's''' location at the end of the cast time.
** The primary target is pushed in a straight line away from that location, but the knockback distance and speed may be impeded by terrain.
** Secondary targets are displaced parallel to the primary target's displacement.
* The {{tip|airborne|icononly = true}} {{tip|stun|crowd control}} is removed early when the forced movement stops.
** At normal knockback distance and knockback speed, this changes the duration of the disable to circa {{fd|0.4}} / {{fd|0.5}} / {{fd|0.6}} seconds by default.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
